name: Redundant
description:
My submission for AdventureJam 2020

I chose the theme "Stagnation / New Beginnings"

The game is very short, i started later with this gamejam. I managed to make a slice or a short episode of what the game could be. One room for now. Enjoy!

Story:

In the future, old service robots are replaced with new & better ones. A retired robot tries to escape his retirement.

Controls:

- WASD to move

- E to interact with objects

- SPACE to advance dialogue

#adventure #AdvJam2020 #scifi #robots #unity #gamecreator
